code: export function capitalize(string){return string?string.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+string.slice(1):null;}export function dateParser(date){var options={hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit",second:"2-digit",weekday:"long",year:"numeric",month:"short",day:"numeric"};var timestamp=Date.parse(date);var result=new Date(timestamp).toLocaleDateString("fr-FR",options);return result.toString();}export function timestampParser(tmstp){var options={hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit",weekday:"long",year:"numeric",month:"short",day:"numeric"};var date=new Date(tmstp).toLocaleDateString("fr-FR",options);return date.toString();}export function isEmpty(value){return value===undefined||value===null||typeof value==="object"&&Object.keys(value).length===0||typeof value==="string"&&value.trim().length===0;}
